name: Spinch
summary: Transcend the material realm and assume your true form as Spinch, a hyper-agile organism consumed by the quest to rescue a litter of its missing offspring, in this side-scrolling, psychedelic platformer from the mind of award-winning Canadian cartoonist, Jesse Jacobs.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 平台: Nintendo Switch
  • 游戏类型: Platformer
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2020-09-03
  • 官方网站: https://www.akuparagames.com/game/spinch/
  • 开发: Queen Bee Games
  • 发行: Akupara Games
